descriptionHtml:
U can\'t use the Vampiric Grip power as a Vampire when The God mode (tgm) is enabled. it won\'t work ... This file will let u to use the Vampiric Grip with something like god mod
****************************************************************************
INSTALLATION:
Just extract \" 123.txt \"  and \" 321.txt \" in your game\'s directory (not in data folder)
****************************************************************************
HOW TO USE:
Just normally start the game and open up the console wit \" ~ \" key and type \" bat 123 \"
now enjoy the vampiric grip with unlimited health,magicka,stamina
type \" bat 321 \" to disable this new god mode.
****************************************************************************
Problems:
It will not make your shouts and powers for unlimited uses. So u have to use \" tgm \" when u r not playing as a vampire lord. :))))
author: Manzari
